name: Xceed Agents
tag_list: virtual-assistant, virtual-assistant-company, professional-virtual-assistant-company, technical-virtual-assistant, admin-assistant, research-assistant, sales-assistant, web-design-assistant, php-assistant, graphic-assistant, programming-assistant, e-learn
overview:
XceedAgents is an offshore partner to small and medium businesses around the world. We work with our customers to provide assistants in the area of sales, marketing, Internet research, web development and day to day essential operations management. We provide assistants 24 / 5 to help our customers and individual CEOs work better, smarter and make their life and business highly efficient.

Mission

To achieve our goals in an environment of speed, transparency, integrity, knowledge and commitment and to make Xceed a place of pride for customers, investors, employees and vendors.
